pullRequest.title: Issuetracker changes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Move the issuetracker package in alert-common back to it's original location from 5.2.0 under the channel package
Remove IssueTrackerFieldException
Rename the issuetracker-jira project to alert-jira to conflicts with the existing issuetracker-jira library jar
Consolidate the com.synopsys.integration.alert.channel.jira.common package into alert-jira

It should primarily changes to imports and moving of files in this PR.  The jira server and cloud channels function properly.

commit.message: Refactor: adding the issuetracker-common and issuetracker-jira code into the Alert repo
Refactoring: moving classes into the alert-common sub project
Refactor: updating imports to put all of the pieces together.
Fix: fixing cloud class usage in the Jira server code and vice versa.
refactor: Move issuetracker package to original location under channel.
refactor: Change issuetracker-jira to alert-jira and remove IssueTrackerFieldException
